Description:
Invest with confidence or ideal first home
Whether it is your first home or an investment to kick start or grow your portfolio, this is a property that commands your attention. Featuring spacious open plan kitchen/dining & living area, this property is sure to accommodate your every need. Providing you with split system heating & cooling that adds to the overall appeal. The functional and modernized kitchen has plenty of cupboard and bench space, plus a combined laundry and bathroom, and generous sized bedroom with built in robe. A second bedroom or study is also on offer. It boasts a private court yard with low maintenance garden. Off street parking is assured with a single carport and lock up storage room for added convenience all in this quiet and neatly kept complex. Perfectly located within easy distance to public transport, The Melbourne Road, schools & parks and the Geelong Ring Road.
Insights: 7/11-17 Howitt Avenue, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Cant Get Much Better Than This!
In a sought after pocket of Corio this brick veneer home will be on top of your list! Close proximity to public transport, schools & a short drive or stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre. Perfect for a first home buyer or young family, there is a park/reserve just a few steps away that will keep the kids entertained for hours! Easy access to the Ring Road, bringing Melbourne under an hour away & Geelongs CBD under 15 mins!
-3 large bedrooms with built in robes
-Central bathroom with separate toilet
-Sunlit lounge with new gas heater & ceiling fan
-Updated kitchen with new stove, rangehood and a large pantry
-Adjoining meals area with new A/C flowing into the lounge
-Polished Tasmanian Oak floor boards
-Covered alfresco overlooking the grassed backyard
-Single lock up garage
-Recently had a new hot water service put in & freshly painted internally
Dont miss out on this one & inspect today!

Description:
Entertainers Delight with In Ground Pool
Introducing a humble home situated on a generous 604 metres of land just ten minutes from Geelong CBD. Situated in a quiet Corio court this is an affordable entry into the popular Geelong region and would be perfect for a first home buyer or investor.
The property features three bedrooms all with built in robes and a generous living area with gas heater and split system heating/air conditioner. The modest kitchen and dining overlook the large backyard where you will find a huge lock up garage/workshop, additional shed, covered alfresco dining and beautiful in ground pool. It is the perfect backdrop to create endless fun for the whole family with birthdays, BBQs and entertaining. There is scope to add your own touch and make this into your own piece of paradise.
You will also be just minutes from Corio Village Shopping Centre, local schools, Norlane Waterworld, Melbourne Ring Road and the Princes Highway. Buy now and get ready for this year's Spring and Summer time fun!
Insights: 8 Minehan Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Do Not Miss This Opportunity - Priced to walk out the door!
Why buy a unit when you can buy a house? Investors, first home buyers or somebody looking at updating and on selling please take note!
Situated in the heart of Corio on a corner allotment making this home the perfect package. Giving you access to 2 separate living areas including a front formal lounge and a rear rumpus/sun room, 1 bathroom and 2 large bedrooms.
This charming abode is situated on a 444m2 (approx) allotment offering you plenty of rear easy access for boats, trailers and/or caravans.
Quality fixtures and fittings included are reverse cycle split system, gas heating, polished floor boards, recently updated kitchen and a separate single lock up garage.
Visit consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist for further information about buying.
Comparable sales for this property available upon request.

Description:
Invest with the Best!
Looking for a project that requires a little tender love & care but possesses the opportunity for fantastic financial growth look no further! Set on a generous allotment of 596m2 (approx.) is this fantastic 3 bedroom home ideal for first home buyers, renovator or savvy investor. Offering a spacious lounge just off the entrance, with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through, central bathroom with separate toilet, kitchen with gas cooking that sits adjacent the dining area & 3 comfortable sized bedrooms (2 with BIR's). With just a short drive to all the main amenities including Corio Village Shopping Centre the property provides easy access to medical facilities, public transport, schools for all ages and just minutes from the Princes Hwy for Geelong commuters & Ring Road for Melbourne or Surf Coast commuters. A fantastic opportunity awaits the first home buyer, renovator or the astute investor to purchase this fantastic home today!

Description:
"Investors & First Home Buyers Take Note!"
A great opportunity to secure this 3 bedroom all with built in robes home which offers many recent upgrades including quality kitchen and stove, floating timber floors throughout, updated bathroom with wall to wall tiles, tiled floors in wet areas.
Outside offers a large double carport with rear access & a fantastic decked undercover alfresco area, perfect for entertaining! Also including rear access to parkland for kids to enjoy. The property is close to schools, shops, public transport & the Melbourne FWY making Melbourne CBD under an hours drive away & Geelong CBD 20 minutes away.
Set on a block size of 574sqm (approx.) & ample backyard this home is not to be missed!
• 3 bedroom home with double carport
• Side access
• Decked undercover alfresco
• 574sqm block (approx.)
• Easy access to Melbourne & Geelong

Description:
You Will Want To Live Here!
Simply stunning and sure to impress this rendered 3 bedroom plus study family home will definitely delight. Low maintenance gardens greet you in the quiet court location in the ever so popular Rose Park Estate. Master bedroom is spacious with full ensuite including double sized shower and walk in robe. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are both large with built in robes. Study has has street views and internal access from the garage. Open plan living throughout with 2 flowing zones perfect for a formal lounge, rumpus or family room. Kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Modern central bathroom with single vanity, shower and deep luxurious spa bath perfect to unwind in. Sliding doors to a fantastic undercover pergola perfect for entertaining all year round. Double garage has an electric panel lift door and rear access perfect to store a trailer, boat or camper van.
Additional features include reverse cycle ducted heating/cooling, LED down lights and styled with new bamboo floor boards. Built by Simmonds and close to schools, shopping, public transport, medical facilities and easy access to the ring road, all your boxes will be ticked.

Description:
Just One Look Is All You Need
Want to walk everywhere and live with a wow factor this home won't disappoint! Brick veneer with 3 large sized bedrooms. Plus extra space perfect for a study, exercise or sunroom with slate floors and sliding doors. Lounge has as new carpet and gas heating. Super gloss tiles throughout the entrance, hall and into the kitchen. Granite stone bench tops feature in newly renovated modern open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Central bathroom has a big shower, single vanity basin and toilet. Additional 2nd toilet off the laundry. Out the back is plenty of room for pets and kids to run free behind secure gates and fences. A double garage any man will love to tinker in or set up a man cave. Additional features include evaporative cooling, plenty of off street parking and only approximately 600 meters to walk to Corio Central shopping centre. With schools, medical facilities, public transport all super close by and easy access to the ring road you have everything you need.

Description:
Love Where You Live!
This perfectly-presented family home in a quiet court location is the ideal residence or investment. Its expansive open-plan design features 4 generous bedrooms, including master with full en suite, second bathroom and two distinct living zones. An impressively large family room with timber floors flows through to the living room with study nook, while a modern kitchen boasts dishwasher, gas stove top and electric oven. A separate meals area leads outside to single lock-up garage and double carport. Walking distance to schools, Corio Village Shopping Centre, transport, medical centres and easy access to the Ring Road, you'll love living here!

Description:
Prime investment opportunity!
The creative and innovative buyer will appreciate the freedom to renovate and transform the property into a stylish home that suits their needs. Capitalise on the wonderful opportunity to purchase this great first home or investment that boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway close by. The home sits on a generous and secure 567sqm block and comprises of 3 generous bedrooms (2 with BIR's), large living area with gas heating, spacious kitchen boasting ample bench space, central bathroom & separate laundry. Outside lies a single carport, double garage & small shed with plenty of rear yard still left over. Immaculately presented & cared for, this property is a neat and tidy investment for all. Brilliantly located in close proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre, numerous schools for all ages, easily accessible public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD. Property with potential like this won't last long, you better be quick!

Description:
Family Home in Prime Position
Take advantage today of this exceptional opportunity in a prime convenient location!
Features tiled entry hall, formal lounge or fourth bedroom - towards the front of the house. The large open plan kitchen/dining/family is centrally located and is the perfect space for the whole family. The spacious kitchen has ample cupboards, pantry, tiled splashback, 600mm electric wall oven and 600mm gas cooktop.
The master bedroom is zoned at the front of the home with walk in robe/ensuite with shower, vanity and toilet. The remaining two bedrooms are towards the rear of the home, all with built in robes and serviced by the family bathroom which includes bath, shower and vanity as well the separate toilet.
The oversized single garage is remote controlled with internal and rear access. Outdoors is an undercover alfresco area which opens out from the living room, ideal for combined indoor/outdoor entertaining. The front is fully landscaped with a generous backyard for the kids to play.
Allotment approximately 517sqm.
Extras include central heating and split system for cooling, side access to backyard, neutral tones throughout.
There is nothing to fault the location as you have access to everything you need! Head further down Bacchus Marsh Road and you have access to the ring road which brings Melbourne within 50 minutes. Walking distance to local bus routes and Corio Shopping Village 400m away. Enquire today.

Description:
Let's Get You Started
This well presented 3 bedroom home is nestled in a quiet court location on a well-established 668m2 (approx) parcel of land. The L-shaped lounge dining has a gas wall furnace & split system air conditioner & adjoins the functional kitchen with pantry, gas cooking & casual meals area. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the central family bathroom. A lovely undercover area is sure to become a favourite place to relax & unwind. The secure & very well established yard has plenty of space for kids & pets. The home is completed by a large double garage, additional garden shed & single carport. Within easy reach of the ring road, Corio Shopping & Medical Centre & services, plus schools & transport, this is a fantastic first home or great addition to your investment portfolio with rental potential of approx $300 per week. Inspection will impress.

Description:
This is Big
Sitting on an allotment over 1,290 sqm, and with a quality home of this size at this value, is simply a rare find. The home itself, built by reputed builder Dennis Family Homes, features 4 bedrooms plus a study, an ensuite to the master and 2 substantial living areas. Light filled with northern exposure, the living has great flow, where you can entertain under the alfresco or straight off the meals area. With floating timber floors, central heating, a double garage and a garden that the children could get lost in, this one owner home is waiting for you to add your own touches. The property presents an investment in your future with a development opportunity (stca) and scope to make it your own. With easy access to the Ring Road, schools, Corio Central Shopping Centre, reserves and tracks, and absolute value that simply cannot be matched. Act quickly and make this nest egg your own.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Best Buy In Geelong!!
If you're after uncomplicated, easy living and love to entertain then this immaculate home, that offers more than meets the eye, is a must see. Featuring 3 Bedroom's, a large living area with gas heating at the front of the home, the recently renovated kitchen overlooks the dining area which in turn opens up to the second living space and the huge undercover deck ideal for entertaining. The SLUG, along with extra off street parking allows for boats, trailers or even caravans!! Located on a brilliant 722sqm approx. block next to a great park and with Northern Bay College at the end of the court & Corio Central only a short walk away this home would make a great first home or an excellent rental property with approx return of $300pw. You will not find better value anywhere else in Geelong!

Description:
"1,428 Reasons To Make A Profit"
Situated within close proximity to all amenities sits this 1,428 sqm (approx.) vacant block of prime land just screaming opportunity. As seen on the street there is plenty of evidence that a multi unit site is well and truly possible (STCA) or simply build your dream home on this perfect parcel of land.
This is a very rare opportunity for a parcel of land of this size to come onto the market in this area with full street frontage of over 20m. These days blocks of land this large are very hard to come by and you dont want to miss this!
With Bell Post Shopping Centre just up the road & Corio Village around the corner all your immediate needs are taken care of, in addition there is public transport running on Matthews Road and Purnell Road & bus stops both within 250m making transport very easy.
There is also child care, primary & high schools within very close proximity in Lovely Banks & Corio.
Zoned General Residential Schedule 1.
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Central Investment or Family Home
Truly a unique one of a kind home, boasting substantial room for the whole family to enjoy! Charm and character are in abundance both externally and internally for this individual property, which sits on an approx. 595m2 corner allotment within easy reach to all major amenities. Stepping inside you'll be greeted by a lovely foyer then onto a large open planned living/meals area that leads through to the generous sized kitchen lined with plenty of cupboards for storage, dishwasher and electric cooking. Comprising of 4 bedrooms in total all with BIR's, with the addition of a comfortable study located at the front. The home also provides a renovated central bathroom complete with corner spa bath as well as the ensuite towards the rear. A 2nd living area can be found at the centre of the home, while the laundry is situated towards the back door. Outside lies an outdoor patio with a low maintenance backyard along with large access roller door perfect for those looking to store trailers, campervans or even for additional parking as well as the sturdy brick double garage. Only minutes' from the Ring Road, Corio Shopping Centre, numerous reserves and schools for all ages the location couldn't be better! Inspections are a must to appreciate all the potential this much loved family home has to offer, don't let an opportunity like this pass you by.
Insights: 31 Merlin Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Comfortable Family Living
Located in a quiet court in a popular pocket of Corio sits this solid 3 bedroom home, ideal for a first home or investment. Close to all the amenities needed with Corio Village Shopping less than a 5 min drive, local schools, park lands & public transport within very close reach!
-3 great sized rooms with BIRs and ceiling fans
-Large sunny lounge with ceiling fan
-Functional kitchen with gas cooking adjoining a meals area with split system A/C
-Large covered entertaining area
-Huge 4 car garage with workshop space
-Potential rental return of $295p/w
Inspect today before you miss out!
